keyEvents.title: Royal Banquet for Straw Hats
keyEvents.description: King Cobra hosts a magnificent banquet at the palace for the Straw Hat Pirates to thank them for saving Arabasta.

keyEvents.title: Palace Baths
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats are invited to enjoy the luxurious palace baths and hot spring steam room.

keyEvents.title: King Cobra's Thanks in Bathhouse
keyEvents.description: King Cobra gives heartfelt thanks to the Straw Hats in the bathhouse, setting aside his royal status to thank them as equals.

description: The royal palace of Arabasta Kingdom located in the capital city of Alubarna. Features grand banquet halls, luxurious bathhouses with hot springs, and serves as the residence of the Nefertari royal family.

keyEvents.title: Going Merry Hidden at Upper Reaches
keyEvents.description: Bon Clay positions the Going Merry at the upper reaches of the Sandora River to help the Straw Hats escape the Marine blockade.

keyEvents.title: Reunion with Bon Clay
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats travel across the desert to reach the Going Merry at the Sandora River where Bon Clay awaits.

keyEvents.title: Marines Locate Straw Hats
keyEvents.description: Marine officer Shine reports to Hina that the Straw Hats' ship has been located at the upper reaches of the Sandora River.

description: A major river in Arabasta that flows through the desert kingdom. The upper reaches serve as a strategic escape point away from the heavily monitored ports.
